name: Algorithm Design
description: Study of advanced algorithm design techniques, including linear programming, complexity theory, NP-completeness, and various algorithmic strategies to solve computational problems.

name: Algorithms and Data Structures
description: Introduction to fundamental algorithms and data structures, covering graph algorithms, greedy methods, dynamic programming, maximum flows, and data handling techniques.

name: Programming Languages and Paradigms
description: Overview of programming language design and paradigms, addressing scoping, type checking, parameter passing, and programming styles like functional and logic programming.

name: Computer Organization
description: Introduction to computer architecture, covering instruction set architecture, memory, I/O, processor implementation, and computer arithmetic, with labs focusing on assembly programming.

name: Fundamentals of Software Development
description: Explores software development practices in object-oriented programming with data structures like lists and trees, recursive algorithms, and commercial software tools.

name: Probability and Statistics for Engineers
description: Covers probability models, random variables, and common distributions, along with statistical methods like hypothesis testing, confidence intervals, and linear regression.
